title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       While Minuteman Missile National Historic Site does not have any concessions, vending machines or overnight facilities, there are plenty of local eateries and overnight accommodations a short drive from the park. These can be found in the following communities:  Local Area Options  Kadoka (19 miles east of Minuteman Missile Visitor Center) - go to the Kadoka Chamber of Commerce website to learn more. Philip (27 miles northeast of Minuteman Missile Visitor Center)- go to the Philip Chamber of Commerce website to learn more.  Wall (21 miles west of Minuteman Missile Visitor Center)- go to the Wall Chamber of Commerce website to learn more.   Regional Options  Rapid City (70 miles west of Minuteman Missile Visitor Center) has a full range of dining and accommodation facilities. Go to the Visit Rapid City website to learn more.   Camping  Minuteman Missile does not have any camping facilities. Nearby Badlands National Park does have campgrounds and the Buffalo Gap National Grasslands which surrounds much of Minuteman Missile allows camping as well. Learn more about Campgrounds close to Minuteman Missile.
